description:
• Course updated March 9th, 2015
  • Publish 5 Apps in a day!
  • Build your App Portfolio!

Your results by taking the course?

  • Five apps on the itunes app store!
  • Completion Certificate
  • Knowledge of Xcode
  • Knowledge of Photoshop
  • How to publish your future applications
  • How to make money from your knowledge

Have you ever wondered how can I make my own app?

How do I code? What skills do I need?

Well, the only information you need is in this course, and will show you how to make your own 4 apps! If you're looking to get into the hot area of app development or create an alternative income from your hobby - then this course is for you!

By very simply listening and following along with the videos, you will have your applications published on the iTunes App Store!

This course is no nonsense and in as little as an hour you to can have your first application ready for the iTunes App Store.

This course will show you all the steps necessary in order for you to publish your own app on the iTunes app store, including all the source codes!

That's right with this course, you get the full source code of the apps included!
title: iOS Development: Design 5 apps including an Apple Watch App!
